gui.popup

Class UniversalBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • gui.popup.UniversalBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable

    final class UniversalBox
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
    This is to be displayed in every App's popup window.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi

    • Constructor Detail

      • UniversalBox

        private UniversalBox(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textColor,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textBoxColor,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color borderColor,
            java.lang.Object layoutData)
        (Same as addUniversalBox(..)). Creates a Composite that displays the GMT, SC, and UTC within the input Composite.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Composite to contain this.
        backgroundColor - The background of the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textBoxColor - The color of the background of the various Texts (textboxes).
        borderColor - The color of the border of this.
        layoutData - The layout data to assign to this.

    • Method Detail

      • addUniversalBox

        public static final void addUniversalBox(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                   org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                   org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textColor,
                   org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textBoxColor,
                   org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color borderColor,
                   java.lang.Object layoutData)
        (Same as new UniversalBox(..)) Creates a Composite that displays the GMT, SC, and UTC within the input Composite.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Composite to contain this.
        backgroundColor - The background of the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textBoxColor - The color of the background of the various Texts (textboxes).
        borderColor - The color of the border of this.
        layoutData - The layout data to assign to this.

                    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textBoxColor)
        Adds Sequence Count content.
        Parameters:
        internal - The composite to contain the bottom content.
        backgroundColor - The background of the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.

      • addTopContent

        private static final void addTopContent(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite internal,
                 org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
                 org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textColor,
                 org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textBoxColor)
        Adds GMT, SC, and UTC content.
        Parameters:
        internal - The composite to contain the top content.
        backgroundColor - The background of the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textBoxColor - The color of the background of the various Texts (textboxes).

      • addLabel

        private static final void addLabel(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
            java.lang.String name,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color backgroundColor,
            org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textColor)
        The helper method to add Labels to this. The Labels display the names "GMT", "SC", "UTC", and "Sequence Count".
        Parameters:
        parent - The Composite to contain the Label.
        name - The text to display within the Label.
        backgroundColor - The background of the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.

      • addText

        private static final void addText(boolean isTopContent,
           org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
           org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textColor,
           org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color textBoxColor,
           java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        isTopContent - True if the text is for GMT, SC, or UTC
        parent - The Composite to contain the Text.
        textColor - The color of the texts within the various contained Labels, Texts, and Composites.
        textBoxColor - The color of the background of the various Texts (textboxes).
        name - The name representing the content. Should be "GMT", "SC", "UTC", or "Sequence Count".
